EmailTemplate.name: 201710_Global_Email_Honeywell Channel Newsletter_JRD.201710_Global_Email_Honeywe
EmailTemplate.subject: Q3 Honeywell Channel Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> BGA CHANNEL NEWSLETTER October 2017 Get the latest news from Honeywell's Q3 2017 Channel Newsletter. New Sales Tool for Honeywell Dealers
The Aero Up app for IOS and Android is designed to give you access to Honeywell brochures, sales bulletins, videos and more from the convenience of your iPad. Download the instructions here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/AeroUp Download Instructions.pdf]]> to start using it today. For questions, please email Ed Tribble <[[mailto:Ed.Tribble@honeywell.com]]>. Satair Registration & ADS-B Out Handout
As the exclusive distributor for Honeywell's suite of ADS-B Out products, it's important that all dealers register with Satair. Click here to download the forms <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Satair Registration_New.pdf]]> and complete your registration today! Please send to Tom Kirsch <[[mailto:tki@satair.com]]> or Larry Brown <[[mailto:lbr@satair.com]]> when finished. 2017 MSCA Extensions
Many of the mechanical service center agreements (MSCA) are expiring December 2017. Honeywell will be extending these authorizations through March 31, 2018. Read more... <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2017 MSCA Extensions.pdf]]> Honeywell Aerospace Trading Inventory
Honeywell Aerospace Trading (HAT) is posting a weekly updated list of available inventory with pricing for many available parts. Download the full list <[[https://na68.salesforce.com/sfc/p/30000000dWxY/a/1B000000k9c1/Ku2jB4CxPByc5FxqMGqgrkcHfD8FBxdHTbIstfgRyRw]]>of available parts here. NBAA 2017Make sure to stop by the Honeywell booth #N5100 for a demo of our products and services. See the full lineup <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2017/october/see-you-at-nbaa-2017]]> of sessions we're holding and products that will be on display! You don't want to miss it. Dubai Airshow 2017
Are you planning to attend the Dubai Airshow this year? If so, we invite you to meet with our regional team and our local channel partner marketing manager. For more information or to schedule a meeting please contact Nick Maynard <[[mailto:Nick.Maynard@Honeywell.com]]>. Jakarta Operators Conference SummaryLast month, Honeywell hosted an operators conference in Jakarta, Indonesia. Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/HOCJKT-Summary_v2.pdf]]>to see what was discussed, pictures and more. New Honeywell Dealer in Africa
ExecuJet Nigeria has been appointed as a new avionics dealer for BGA in Africa. They will target aircraft in West, Central and North Africa in order to provide operators access to... Read more <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/New Honeywell Dealer in Africa.pdf]]>. Honeywell Channel Marketing Team
Did you know that Honeywell has a team of six people positioned around the world to help you market Honeywell products and services? Download our coverage map here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Channel Marketing Team_By Region.jpg]]> and contact one of our channel marketing leaders to begin your first campaign! Q3 STCs To see the full list of FAA and EASA STCs approved in Q3, please join the conversation on the Honeywell Aerospace Dealer LinkedIn group <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/Bg00RQ2XZ00000bI00Oq00G]]>. Do you know someone who should be added to the Honeywell Channel Newsletter distribution list? Sign them up here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Honeywell-Channel-Newsletter-Subscription.html?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTVRRNVl6QmhNekZsWW1VeSIsInQiOiJOb1JmU0dFSUdKbU1NMkJHalFoQVR4WjYxOG5mVUVQWTB0Zk1ReVlKM2NsODZiMzBQUWszdGxPb0xjUW4zQWFMYTJtWHdqNWp1NTRZS3dVQXdIS0RcL3c9PSJ9]]>.
